text: Dakara anata gata ryōnin wa okonatte, kare ni itte yaru ga ī. “Hontōni watashi-tachi wa, anata no omo no shitodearu. Dakara watashi-tachi to issho ni Isuraeru no shison-tachi o shakuhō shi, kare-ra o kurushimete wa naranai. Hontōni watashi-tachi wa, shirushi o motte anata no nushi kara kita monodearu. Onmichibiki ni shitagau mono wa, heiandearu
